elementary.title: Elementary
elementary.description: Our beginner course will help you master the basics: alphabet, grammar, speaking skills, and readiness to communicate in English.

intermediate.title: Pre-Intermediate
intermediate.description: Designed for learners with basic English skills who want to improve grammar, expand vocabulary, and speak more confidently.

upper.title: Upper-Intermediate
upper.description: Advanced English course focusing on speaking, grammar, vocabulary, reading complex texts, and engaging in deep discussions.

about.title: About Me:
about.text: I have a background in English language and linguistics, and I’ve been actively teaching students of different ages and levels. My English proficiency is at a solid C1 level – I speak fluently, write clearly, and have a strong command of grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation.

reviews.name: Aigul Karimova
reviews.text: I went from A1 to B1 — incredible progress! I used to be afraid to speak, but now I can easily talk about simple topics. Highly recommended for beginners!

reviews.name: Ivan Petrov
reviews.text: The teachers explain grammar perfectly. I especially liked the interactive exercises and practice with native speakers. I now feel confident at B1 level.

reviews.name: Asel Nurmanova
reviews.text: Before the course, I couldn’t even make one sentence. Now I read English articles with ease. All thanks to the step-by-step teaching method!

reviews.name: Daniil Kuznetsov
reviews.text: Great approach! Lots of real practice, real dialogues, and excellent materials. The best course I’ve seen for levels A1-B2.

reviews.name: Madina Erzhanova
reviews.text: I finished the B1-B2 course and finally stopped being afraid to speak. Lessons are fun, and teachers are super supportive. Thank you to the whole team!

reviews.name: Sergey Lapin
reviews.text: The course helped organize my knowledge and fill grammar gaps. Audio training and speaking practices were especially useful.

reviews.name: Albina Sadykova
reviews.text: Very satisfied! The course is beginner-friendly and well-structured. I started from A1 and now understand English movies with subtitles!

reviews.name: Zhenisbek Mukhamedov
reviews.text: I thought online learning wouldn’t work, but I was wrong. Clear, to the point, and no fluff. Great course for those studying and working at the same time.
